entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
